animeDescription: Locomon, a train digimon, has suddenly appeared in the real world. All the tamers scramble to stop the train before it reaches its final destination: the portal into the Digital world.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Imai, Yuka', 'Tada, Aoi', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Tsumura, Makoto', 'Yamaguchi, Mayumi', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Asada, Yoko']
